animad-app.error_msg_421: Server unable to produce a response.
animad-app.error_msg_422: Unable to process the request due to semantic errors.
animad-app.error_msg_428: The origin server requires the request to be conditional.
animad-app.error_msg_431: Header field or the header at all was too large.
animad-app.error_msg_451: Ressource unavailable due to legal reasons.
